bullets: Assisted in debugging and resolving issues, gaining practical experience in software development lifecycle.
Collaborated with a team to implement new features and optimize existing code for improved performance.
Developed and maintained web applications, contributing to front-end and back-end functionalities.
Utilized Python for backend logic and data analysis, with a focus on delivering actionable market insights.
Designed and developed a user-friendly interface for portfolio tracking, including transaction management and performance metrics.
Implemented real-time stock data retrieval and visualization features.
items.name: StockFolio
items.summary: A comprehensive platform for Stock Market Analysis and Portfolio Management, enabling users to track real-time data, analyze trends, and manage investments.

bullets: Designed and managed the MySQL database schema for efficient storage and retrieval of job listings, user profiles, and application data.
Implemented secure user authentication and authorization mechanisms for role-based access control.
Developed distinct user interfaces and functionalities for job seekers (profile creation, application submission) and employers (job posting, applicant screening).
items.name: HireArchy
items.summary: Engineered 'HireArchy,' a dynamic, role-based job portal built with JSP, Servlets, and MySQL, designed for streamlined recruitment and applicant management.
